ing: 1/4 cup soy milk, or more as needed
des: "My kids love this frosting. They said it tastes like the filling in a peanut butter cup. My son has a milk allergy, so I came up with this recipe."
ins: Whip peanut butter, shortening, and vanilla together in a mixing bowl until well blended. Add powdered sugar and soy milk; mix until light and fluffy. If mixture is too thick, add 1 tablespoon soy milk at a time until creamy and spreadable.
